forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. North northeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle light spills into the sky, promising a day of mainly sunny conditions ahead. The air feels crisp, cool enough to invite a light jacket, especially as the chill of the night lingers. You can anticipate a high hovering close to sixty, with a gradual dip to fifty-seven by afternoon, accompanied by a breeze from the north-northeast, adding a refreshing touch to the morning. 

The golden hues of early sun may wrestle with remnants of hazy marine layer, but any fog that lingers is likely to lift gracefully, revealing the city’s vibrant hues as the day unfolds. It’s shaping up to be a pleasant start to the year; consider a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, perhaps followed by a quiet read in one of the inviting local coffee spots while you sip a warm drink. The atmosphere encourages possibilities—each moment, a chance to embrace the serene beauty of the city as it awakens.
